item.title: Report X-2024061337
item.description:
Report X-2024061337

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-26T15:13:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-13
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On June 13th during the PM sort a cooler was discovered leaking with the words "Sulfuric Acid" on some documents on top of the cooler. Further inspection showed 2 bottles inside labeled as sulfuric acid, and 2 other bags with what is suspected to be water. It is unclear if the spilled liquid is the acid or water or a combination of the two. The package was placed into a salvage drum and is being held pending disposition.

item.title: Report X-2024060832
item.description:
Report X-2024060832

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-24T15:13:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-07
  • City: LENEXA
  • State: KS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: LEAKER WAS CALLED INTO THE DMP AND DMP DISPATCHED A RESPONDER WITH FULL PPE AND SPILL CART. RESPONDER ARRIVED ON SCENE AND FOUND THE LEAKER. RESPONDER CONSULTED WITH THE DECISON TREE ON HOW TO PROCEED WITH THE CLEAN UP. RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL FOLLOWING DECISON TREE GUIDLINES. RESPONDER BROUGHT THE LEAKER BACK TO THE DMP FOR PROPER DISPOSAL.
